price: 15. Ma Waxaan ku daalnay abuuristii hore? Mayee, waxay ka shakisan yihiin abuuris cusub (Aakhirada).
arabic: أَفَعَيِينَا بِٱلۡخَلۡقِ ٱلۡأَوَّلِۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ فِي لَبۡسٖ مِّنۡ خَلۡقٖ جَدِيدٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: afaʿayīnā bil-khalqi al-awali bal hum fī labsin min khalqin jadīdin
